name: web2js
description: Convert "Pascal" output of WEB into JavaScript

scripts.generate-wasm: tie -m etex.web texk/tex.web etexdir/etex.ch date.ch && tangle -underline etex.web etex.sys && node compile.js etex.p
scripts.optimize-wasm: wasm-opt -O tex.wasm -o out.wasm && mv out.wasm tex.wasm
scripts.generate-core: npm run build && npm run generate-wasm && npm run optimize-wasm && node initex.js

author: Jim Fowler
